page.title: 06DUNDONALD - LEISURE
page.content: There are some good swimming pools in the area _ the Magnum in Irvine.Also Ayr, Prestwick and Kilmarnock all have pools.The Magnum Leisure Centre (largest in Europe)is regularly used by Dundonald people of all ages who go there to use its many facilities _Swimming Pool,Ice Rink, Curling,Badminton,Squash,Indoor Bowling,Football,Basketball,Volleyball Table Tennis and a Gymnasium.There is also a restaurant,cafe,bar,cinema and even a small theatre. { OTHER CLUBS IN DUNDONALD. Womens Guild _The Guild meets every second Monday from September to March in the church hall and lasts from 7.30pm till 9.30pm.It has around 50 members and each week members pay 30 pence which entitles them to tea and cakes.
